mapper.select: select * from f_user where user_account = #{account} and user_password = #{password}
select t1.*, GROUP_CONCAT(t3.role_name) as role from f_user t1 left join role_user t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id left join f_role t3 on t2.role_id = t3.id where t1.user_account = #{account} group by t1.id

select t1.id, user_name, last_login_date, avatar, enable, GROUP_CONCAT(t3.role_name) as role from f_user t1 left join role_user t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id left join f_role t3 on t2.role_id = t3.id group by t1.id
